summary: I am a software engineer with over eight years of experience and a proven ability to quickly adapt to various technology stacks. I have played a key role on two product teams at idealo for the past five years. Although I have the most experience in back-end and infrastructure development, I've been exposed to front-end development in the past two years. A vital aspect of my work is helping the business thrive. Before diving into the code, I always aim to understand the product and the customer. I lead and work by applying principles of extreme ownership.

positions.title: Software Engineer
description: Improved GraphQL API response times by 15%, leading to a better user experience under high traffic.
Led the first phase of our new data product's architectural design.
Debugged a complex anomaly in our produced business data, blocking our data product from going live. The debugging involved understanding the systems across teams.
Reduced the number of false system alerts by 20% by applying the Google SRE principles. This increased developer productivity as we had to do less context-switching.
Pitched the idea of chaos testing, which made us aware that our system was not tolerating specific downstream service outages well.
Coached & mentored one of the team members, which led to a more effective team.

positions.title: Software Engineer
description: Promoted from Analyst to Senior Analyst in 1 year.
Eliminated duplicated code in our test suite, which improved developer productivity.
Refactored existing codebase by applying clean-code principles.
Implemented full-stack features using TypeScript / Angular & Java / Spring Boot.
Mentored one of our junior team members.

positions.title: Software Engineer
description: Started a small business to serve my client, Geniefacts
Analyzed the business requirements by having regular calls with the CEO of Geniefacts.
Integrated Google Sheets API into the system

positions.title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Developed a full-stack application using Java EE & PrimeFaces for JSF.
Analyzed business requirements with the client in Munich

positions.title: German Speaking IT Service Desk Agent
description: Provided first-level technical support to German customers via phone

education.subject: Computer Science and Electrical Engineering
education.thesis: Implementation and Evaluation of a Search Engine

education.subject: Medicine
education.note: After three years, I quit and pursued my childhood dream of becoming a programmer. I wanted a career that gives more freedom than being a doctor.

volunteering.description: Taught teenagers programming at a summer camp
